General.Name: Zhejiang Orient Holdings Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Orient Financial Holdings Group Co., Ltd. engages in the financial and quasi-financial businesses in the People's Republic of China. It engages in the trust, futures, fund management, fund investment, financial leasing, and factoring businesses; provision of asset management, private equity investment fund management, investment consulting, and investment management services; and life, health, accident, and other insurance businesses, as well as reinsurance business. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Orient Holdings Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No.12, West Lake Avenue, Hangzhou, China, 310009
